dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3929949J] Abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2007 11:32 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3929949J] Abuse

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Abuse
Added by system at Thursday, May 3 2007 04:06 pm 
X-MailFrom: ozdemir@ts-host.com

helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)

 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
        id 1HjiV3-0006VZ-Mb 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 03 May 2007 16:06:05 -0500

        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)

        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 03 May 2007 16:06:02 -0500

        id 1HjiUz-0006hH-6P; Thu, 03 May 2007 17:06:01 -0400 
Received: from 68.215.172.200 ([68.215.172.200]) 
        (SquirrelMail authenticated user ozdemir@ts-host.com) 
        by ent01.tulix.com with HTTP; 
        Thu, 3 May 2007 17:06:01 -0400 (EDT) 
Message-ID: <50778.68.215.172.200.1178226361.squirrel@ent01.tulix.com> 
Date: Thu, 3 May 2007 17:06:01 -0400 (EDT) 
Subject: Abuse 
From: ozdemir@ts-host.com 
To: abuse@ev1servers.net, 
 abuse@theplanet.com 
User-Agent: SquirrelMail/1.4.9a 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=iso-8859-1 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit 
X-Priority: 3 (Normal) 
Importance: Normal 
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it
with any abuse report 
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - ent01.tulix.com 
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com 
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [32031 32032] / [47 12] 
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - ts-host.com 
X-Source:  
X-Source-Args:  
X-Source-Dir:  
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 May 2007 21:06:05.0964 (UTC)
FILETIME=[DD53B4C0:01C78DC6] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
 Dear The Planet, 
 
 One of your customers are abusing our terms. They have copied our
Turkish 
website of our office in Turkey and they are selling our website on 
theirs. 
 
  Please take action and suspend this domain 
name(http://www.registercenter.net). 
 
 
  Our Turkish Office Website: http://www.tshost.com.tr 
  Our USA office Website: http://www.tshost.com 
 
  The URL where our website copied to http://hosting.registercenter.net 
  The URL where they are selling our website content including images
and 
scripts: http://www.registercenter.net/packages.php?spt=2 
 
  Please inform us if you do need any other information from us to 
investigate this issue. 
 
  Thank you in advance for your support on this issue. 
 
 
------------------------------------- 
Eyyup Ozdemir 
Manager of Web Services 
Tulip Systems, Inc. 
3495 Piedmont Rd. 
Building 12 Suite 110 
Atlanta, GA  30305 
Phone: 404/869-0345 x.208 
Fax: 404/2312029 
-------------------------------------
